Package it.polimi.ingsw.Exceptions.Game

package it.polimi.ingsw.Exceptions.Game
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    it.polimi.ingsw.Exceptions.Game.Model
     
  • Exception Classes
    Class
    Description
    GameException
    Represents a base exception class for exceptions occurring in the context of the game.
    InvalidActionForGameStateException
    Exception thrown when a player attempts an action that is not valid in the current game state.
    InvalidActionForPlayerStateException
    Exception thrown when a player attempts an action that is not valid in their current state.
    See PlayerStates for valid player states and corresponding actions.
    MaxGoldenCardsDrawnException
    Exception thrown when a player attempts to draw an extra golden card beyond the maximum allowed during the cards setup state.
    MaxResourceCardsDrawnException
    Exception thrown when a player attempts to draw an extra resource card beyond the maximum allowed during the cards setup state.
    MoveAttemptOnWaitStateException
    Exception thrown when a player attempts a move while in a "wait" state and don't have the permission to perform this action (usually thrown in asynchronous contexts once player has completed all allowed steps).
    NotYourTurnException
    Exception thrown when a player attempts to perform a move when it is not their turn.
    PlayerNotFoundException
